Package models

Interface PortfolioModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioModelImpl
    public interface PortfolioModel
    Represents classes that manage stock portfolios and all their associated functionalities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • addPortfolio

        Add a portfolio to the current user.
        Parameters:

      • getPortfolio

        models.Portfolio getPortfolio​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Finds and retrieves a portfolio of the current user, searching by the portfolio name.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Name of the portfolio to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Portfolio object with all of its stocks and quantities.

      • getPortfolios

        java.lang.String[] getPortfolios()
        Retrieves the names of all portfolios of the current user.
        Returns:
        Names of all portfolios.

        Retrieves all the values of all stocks in a portfolio on a particular date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Name of the portfolio.
        date - Date to get the values for.
        Returns:
        All stocks and their values on the given date.

      • isValidTicker

        java.lang.Boolean isValidTicker​(java.lang.String ticker)
        Checks if a given stock ticker symbol is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        ticker - Ticker symbol of the stock.
        Returns:
        True if symbol is a valid ticker, False if not.

        Returns:
